titles.title: A bill to designate Jackson and Williamson Counties in Illinois as a single metropolitan statistical area.

bill.summary: 6/22/1988--Introduced. Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to designate the counties of Jackson and Williamson in Illinois as a single metropolitan statistical area.
